attributes.title: Extremely disappointed
attributes.review: This app was beyond a let down, it took not hours but days to download on my brand new iPhone 11 so frankly the phone could not be the problem. It froze on multiple occasions and even forcibly shut down my phone. I have had to restart and turn off my phone to continue using the app which I SHOULD NOT HAVE TO. Absolutely nothing has been done to fix these bugs and Iâ€™m sick of it. I made sure to enable notifications but I never seem to get any and the few times that I do they literally blow up my phone. The administration and developers should be ashamed and I want it removed!

I canâ€™t even begin to explain the amount of despair and trauma this app has caused me. I think ive become deathly allergic, Becuase a few months prior seeing this app on the App Store would constantly make me sneeze... and sure with a giant Cheeto as president I figured it was the dust flying up into my face from his old orange self. But not even seeing the app on my home screen I start crying, sweating, sneezing uncontrollably and my throat almost locks up. I had to delete it it was causing me emotional, mental, and physical pain. I think Honestly for the safety of society this app should be completely removed some nobody else catches the Cheeto diseases that fumes off of this application.
